channel.title: Register on .Net Programmer Incubator
channel.description: Recent content in Register on .Net Programmer Incubator

item.title: Register and Login
item.description: Let’s Create a database first register form: Right-click on “Models” and move the mouse to the “Add” button, then a new window with many options appears, click “class…”. Enter a name for your new class and click “Add”. Edit new properties in the class file. Open the file “ApplicationDbContext.cs” in the “Data” folder and add Dbset the new class will just be created. Right-click on any of the folders in “Solution Explorer” and move the mouse to the “Add” button, then a new window with many options appears, click “New Scaffolded Item”.
